```
modin/polars/base.py BasePolarsDataset from __future__ import annotations from typing import TYPE_CHECKING, Any, Sequence import polars from modin.core.storage_formats import BaseQueryCompiler _query_compiler: BaseQueryCompiler     def tail(self, n: int = 5) -> "DataFrame":
        """
        Get the last n rows of the DataFrame.

        Args:
            n: Number of rows to get.

        Returns:
            DataFrame with the last n rows.
        """
        return self.__constructor__(
            _query_compiler=self._query_compiler.getitem_row_array(slice(-n, None))
        )
```
